meta_info: ::id web1-eng-DF-228-194853-1053854_0001.1 ::date 2015-08-10T10:42:44 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Hi, I'm Art Paul Schlosser and I was nominated for 3 MAMAs which are Madison Area Music Awards. # ::save-date Thu Sep 24, 2015 ::file web1-eng-DF-228-194853-1053854_0001_1.txt
sentence: Hi, I'm Art Paul Schlosser and I was nominated for 3 MAMAs which are Madison Area Music Awards.

meta_info: ::id web1-eng-DF-228-194853-1053854_0001.2 ::date 2015-08-10T10:43:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt I was nominated as UNIQUE Artist of the Year, UNIQUE Album of the Year for my Album: Now Playing Monster which you can now check out at both http://www.broadjam.com/artpaul and http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/artpaul31 or if you prefer it is also at Apple iTunes. # ::save-date Thu Sep 28, 2017 ::file web1-eng-DF-228-194853-1053854_0001_2.txt
sentence: I was nominated as UNIQUE Artist of the Year, UNIQUE Album of the Year for my Album: Now Playing Monster which you can now check out at both http://www.broadjam.com/artpaul and http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/artpaul31 or if you prefer it is also at Apple iTunes.

meta_info: ::id web1-eng-DF-228-194853-1053854_0001.3 ::date 2015-08-10T10:46:46 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt And the song No Women No Fries on the Album was nominated for a MAMA in the POP & R & B category so I hope you will VOTE for them ! # ::save-date Wed Dec 9, 2015 ::file web1-eng-DF-228-194853-1053854_0001_3.txt
sentence: And the song No Women No Fries on the Album was nominated for a MAMA in the POP & R & B category so I hope you will VOTE for them !
